summary: This mod adds a new pair of Deathbrand Gauntlets with a different enchantment that enhances the damage done with Two-Handed weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new pair of Deathbrand Gauntlets with a different enchantment.

IMPORTANT: This mod requires Dragonborn DLC

It does not replace the originals.

Name: Deathbrand Gauntlets. (notice the dot)
ID: xx0036cc
Enchantment: Two-Handed attacks do 20% more damage (damage does not increase with the amount of armor pieces.

This is my first mod so it might have some flaws, if it does then please tell me.
author: Exelentxx
